testcase.brief: Unit Test 0603: Verify that NAT works with static IP and/or static route assignment
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: After WANAddressing_UnitTest_ConfigCLI_21
Test Procedure: connect AP1' eth0 to another AP2's eth1, config static ip on AP1 eth0, set default gateway to AP2 mgt0 ip. Config static ip route on AP2 such that traffic to PC's subnet can route to AP1's eth0 CLI commands: (on AP1) no interface eth0 dhcp client interface eth0 ip <AP1_ETH0_IP/MASK> dns server-ip 218.108.200.248 ip route default gateway <AP2_MGT0_IP> show running-config save config (on AP2) interface mgt0 ip <AP2_MGT0_IP/MASK> interface eth0 mode wan interface eth1 mode bridge-access interface eth1 mac-learning enable ip route net <AP1_MGT0_SUBNET> <AP1_MGT0_MASK> gateway <AP1_ETH0_IP> show running-config save config

step.desc: Login into AP, it can ping domain name

step.telnet: -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}"

step.console: -v "interface eth0 mode wan" -v "no interface eth0 mode wan nat" -v "no interface eth0 dhcp client" -v "interface eth0 ip ${br1.ap1.eth0.ip}/24" -v "ip route default gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}" -v "dns server-ip ${pub.dns1.ip}"

step.desc: AP set mgt0.2 and mgt0.3 Enable dhcp server
step.console: -v "interface mgt0.2 vlan ${br1.vlan2}" -v "interface mgt0.2 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server enable"
-v "user-profile fw22 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vlan2} attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable"

step.desc: BR Set static routing to net
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
it should NOT be able to access domain name.
